name: Crap Shoot
description:
You have too much junk, and it’s time to clean house. Launch your stuff sky high and shoot it into oblivion! A great time waster, and probably the okayest way to pass time on the toilet. Get it?

**This game is still in development and is not complete yet—there are no failure conditions, menus, or instructions.** This project is intended to test my skills in working with Unity and to help fill out my portfolio. In case it looks familiar, it was built using Kenny assets. 

Feel free to share in any way you see fit. Feedback is also greatly appreciated. Thanks for playing!
